#summary An Introduction to the Create Object menu in the Admin CP
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The Create Object menu is the first place to go to add new content to your site.


= Menu Items =

 * [CreateItem Item] - Add a new product
 * [CreateCategory Category] - Add a new product category
 * [CreateNewsPost News Post] - Add a new news post
 * [CreateTechHelpPost Technical Tips] - Add a new technical tips post
